title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A Leader's Guide to High-Performance Organizations (MAM225)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高绩效组织领导者指南 (MAM225)
abstract: Cloud adoption success requires more than technical excellence—it demands the right organizational structure. This session reveals six characteristics that define high-performing software teams: highly aligned, loosely coupled, outcome focused, well controlled, right sized, and long lived. Drawing from patterns across digital-native companies, you'll learn advanced frameworks that go beyond standard agile practices. Discover practical assessment methods and implementation strategies to overcome organizational barriers and build teams that consistently deliver speed and business outcomes. Designed for IT executives and change agents ready to elevate performance or scale for growth.
abstract_cn: 云采用的成功不仅需要技术卓越，还需要正确的组织架构。本次会议揭示了定义高绩效软件团队的六个特征：高度一致、松散耦合、结果导向、良好管控、规模适当和长期稳定。借鉴数字原生公司的模式，您将学习超越标准敏捷实践的高级框架。探索实用的评估方法和实施策略，以克服组织障碍并建立持续交付速度和业务成果的团队。专为准备提升绩效或扩大增长规模的IT高管和变革推动者设计。
